## Resources.IResourceManagerCloneOptions.candidates property

Optional array of loose condition declarations to be applied as edits during the clone operation. These conditions can modify or extend the resource candidates in the cloned manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly candidates?: ReadonlyArray<ResourceJson.Json.ILooseResourceCandidateDecl>;
```
